channel.title: [PI] Stance of Zombie shirt l0l
channel.description: My shirt looks terrible. I wanna fix it. I think this is server-sided. So help please. It looks like this atm, whenever i wear shirt, my hands go back and it looks like that. Its a buggy h'ween :p. [img]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/Hweencostume.jpg[/img]
